title: About
subtitle: I'm Rama
summary: An Informatics Engineering student at Mataram University. At the age of 21, I have developed a great interest in programming and design, which I continue to develop throughout my academic journey. In addition to writing code, I also have skills in various parallel areas that strengthen my ability to create innovative and effective technology solutions. I am always eager to learn and collaborate, and ready to take on challenges in the tech world.
